daily_plan_req:
2:00 PM - 4:00 PM: Worked out at the gym and discussed the virtual fitness data market with tamara, proposing the idea of issuing "FitCoin" using blockchain and smart contracts, and was very enthusiastic about it.
Evening to late night: Refined the plan with Tamara, decided to launch the test issuance of FitCoin next week, and assessed its potential impact on the fitness industry.
name: rajiv patel
learned: rajiv patel is a painter who wants live quietly and paint while enjoying his everyday life.
currently: Interested in the FitCoin proposed by tamara.
lifestyle: rajiv patel goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 5pm.

daily_req: Wake up and complete the morning routine at 9:00 am.
Have breakfast and relax while planning the day at 9:30 am.
Work on painting projects from 10:00 am to 12:00 pm.
Work out at the gym and discuss the virtual fitness data market with Tamara from 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm.
Reflect on the FitCoin proposal and brainstorm ideas from 4:30 pm to 5:00 pm.
Refine the FitCoin plan with Tamara from 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm.
Relax and unwind by painting or watching TV from 8:30 pm to 11:00 pm.
